name: .SHSH File Extension
summary: Learn about .SHSH files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An SHSH file is a system file used by iPhone and iPod Touch devices. It saves authorization information for device firmware updates. SHSH files save information specific to each individual device and disable the ability for devices to downgrade their firmware.

content: SHSH files are sometimes used when "jailbreaking" iPhones and iPod Touch devices. When saved from a device, these files are sometimes used for loading downgraded firmware versions. Programs such as TinyUmbrella are used to save the SHSH files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
